Apos.​Input.​Condition
Apos.​Input.​ConditionGamePad
Apos.​Input.​ConditionKeyboard

Interface for a Condition.

Functions
Pressed
bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when a condition was false and is now true.

Held
bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when a condition is now true.

HeldOnly
bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when a condition was true and is now true.

Released
bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when a condition was true and is now false.
